channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Elon Musk Makes Part of X Algorithm Open Source, Says It ‘Sucks’
Bolna nabs $6.3 million from General Catalyst for its India-focused voice orchestration platform
item.description: Bolna said that 75% of its revenue is coming from self-serve customers.

item.title: Anthropic’s CEO stuns Davos with Nvidia criticism
item.description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei unloaded on both the administration and U.S. chip companies over plans to sell to China. The criticism was particularly notable because one of those chipmakers, Nvidia, is a major partner and investor in Anthropic.

item.title: Netflix to redesign its app as it competes with social platforms for daily engagement
item.description: At the center of the redesign is deeper integration of vertical video feeds, which the streaming giant has been experimenting with since May.

item.title: Younger workers are more worried about AI taking their jobs - but some don't expect any effects at all
item.description: Younger workers are most worried about AI taking their jobs, but older workers are ready to adapt.
